text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser got injured during training, so I rushed to the infirmary.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: With this injury, I'll have to take a break from training for a while, won't I...? Mmm~n...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Um, if I endure the pain a bit, can't I still train...?
choice_data_list: Let's stop once for the sake of continuing to run
Let's try to figure out what we can do

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hau... You're right... It's dangerous to push myself too hard...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: All I can do now is heal my injury quickly... I'll behave myself today...
Matikanetannhauser said disappointedly and went back to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's head to the course right away and see if there's anything we can do!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Kuhah~... No good~... Just putting a little force makes it go zing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It seems all I can do now is rest... Oh dear~...
Matikanetannhauser, looking pained, slowly went back to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: --Phew! As long as I don't sprint at full speed, it seems okay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Until it fully heals, I can probably train like this! Phew, that's a relief!
Matikanetannhauser, being mindful of the injury, trained within a safe range.
